name: PURGE (itch) (strangeyk)
description: Taking inspiration from games such as the cult classic Doom, and from series such as "Zelda", this game was made with GB studio and designed for the Gameboy, the crux of the game rests on clearing rooms of enemies within a timer for experience and to prevent losing lives, you must find the three keys to get to the final boss, are you quick enough to beat the clock, or will you fail your purge?
